abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
abilities.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's darkvision.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The amnizu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The amnizu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: charm person, command
* 3/day each: dominate person, fireball
* 1/day each: dominate monster, feeblemind

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
